// Generated by Microsoft (R) HLSL Shader Compiler 9.29.952.3111

//

//   float4 cxmul;
//   float4 mvp[2];
//

// Registers:
//
//   Name         Reg   Size
//   ------------ ----- ----
//   mvp          c6       2
//   cxadd        c8       1
//   cxmul        c9       1
//

    vs_3_0
    def c0, 0, 1, 0, 0
def c220, 0, 0, 0.0625, 0
    dcl_color v0
    dcl_color1 v1
    dcl_position v2
    dcl_color o0
    dcl_color1 o1
    dcl_texcoord o2
    dcl_texcoord1 o3
    dcl_position o4
dcl_2d s0
dp4 r4.x, v2, c6

// Adjust X Coord from Const1 in dx9settings.ini:
texldl r1, c220.z, s0
mul r1.x, r1.x, c200.x
add r4.x, r4.x, r1.x
mov o4.x, r4.x

    dp4 o4.y, v2, c7
    mov o0, v0
    mov o1, v1
    mov o2, c8
    mov o3, c9
    mov o4.zw, c0.xyxy

// approximately 7 instruction slots used
